channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: For now, data ignorance is bliss on Wall Street as investors are warned not to rely too heavily on private surveys
item.description: The U.S. government is nearing its longest shutdown in history, with Republicans and Democrats still at loggerheads over the nationâ€™s budget. While the standoff shows no immediate sign of easing, investors and policy decision-makers are flying blind without federal data to help color their perceptions about the health of the economy.
